TEXT: CARDINAL . Mrs PERSON , an assistant psychologist at the coordination bureau of ORG in PERSON , lives in LOC di Carrara .

CARDINAL . On DATE she applied to ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) for judicial review of CARDINAL decisions in which the ORG had refused to appoint her to a post in a higher category than the one she held , although she had been in second or third place on the reserve lists published each time such posts had fallen vacant .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE , the text of which was deposited with the registry on CARDINAL DATE , the ORG allowed her application .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG appealed to the PERSON . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE the PERSON ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the applicant filed at the registry of the Consiglio di Stato an application for the case to be set down for an urgent hearing . In a judgment of DATE , the text of which was deposited with the registry on CARDINAL DATE , the PERSON dismissed the appeal as being ill - founded .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG assigned the applicant to assistant coordinator grade with effect from DATE .
